channel.title: 99 firemaking party!
channel.description:
[img]http://img821.imageshack.us/img821/6255/99fmx.png[/img] [size=36pt]Road to 99 Firemaking.[/size]
I am currently 98 firemaking. [img]http://img180.imageshack.us/img180/9158/90fm.png[/img] [img]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/4165/98fm.png[/img] Ohhhh yes. I don't care about my name because I didn't bot. <3
[size=36pt]Goals:[/size]
[ul][li][s]90 Firemaking[/s][/li] [li][s]91 Firemaking[/s][/li] [li][s]92 Firemaking[/s][/li] [li][s]93 Firemaking[/s][/li] [li][s]94 Firemaking[/s][/li] [li][s]95 Firemaking[/s][/li] [li][s]96 Firemaking[/s][/li] [li][s]97 Firemaking[/s][/li] [li]98 Firemaking[/li] [li]99 FIREMAKING[/li][/ul]
I WILL LET YOU KNOW WHEN THE PARTY IS! IT WILL PROBABLY BE SOME TIME TOMMORROW! 11/8/2010!
I do not bot. Any suggestions or advice would be nice! Thanks!

item.title: 99 firemaking party!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Stupit, post:24, topic:362051”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=458325.msg3359825#msg3359825 date=1286243727]

What is Runescape about?
Answer: Fun and enjoying your time.

What is firemaking?
Answer: A guy boring himself to death by clicking on a log for 3 days for a cape or/and a big cannon in their hands.

Is firemaking boring?
Answer:yes!

This is copyright of paymon and is evidence that firemaking is boring.

We’ll settle this copyright claim in court. I call Miles Edgeworth as my attorney.
[/quote]
Lol. Also, guys. Level 93 now.[/quote]Mark it on your list

Read full topic
